title: Gear Drive - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Shoujo Ai   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Manga   Adventurers   Artificial Intelligence   Cheats   Female Protagonist   Guilds   Heroes   Late Romance   Strong to Stronger   Weak to Strong

description:
I, Anti Kythira, am a manaless. Kids who can’t learn magic even after turning 15 will be sent to church to be bestowed a power from the god. I was also one of them but…

Wiiiinnnngggggggg…..

An adventure for Anti and only Anti will begin!?>
